sets.tps: 200 HP, 20 En, 200 M Def, 80 R Def
sets.detail:
200 HP, 200 Melee Defense and Robust is to be as Melee bulky as possible 
 80 Ranged Defense is leftovers and improves overall bulk 
 20 Energy = 256 Energy at level 50 for (3 Baffles + 2 Slap Downs + 1 Shadow Sprint) 
 0 Speed UPs and Sluggish is to pivot in your slower teammates safely with Baffle
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer

sets.tps: 200 HP, 20 En, 80 M Def, 200 R Def
sets.detail:
200 HP, 200 Ranged Defense and Clever is to be as Ranged bulky as possible 
 80 Melee Defense Defense is leftovers and improves overall bulk 
 20 Energy = 256 Energy at level 50 for (3 Baffles + 2 Slap Downs + 1 Shadow Sprint) 
 0 Speed UPs and Sluggish is to pivot in your slower teammates safely with Baffle
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer
